name: MTKTextureLoader.CubeLayout
desc: Options for specifying how cube texture data is arranged in the source image.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a cube layout option from a raw string value.

items.name: static let vertical: MTKTextureLoader.CubeLayout
items.desc: Specifies that the source 2D image is a vertical arrangement of six cube faces.
